attributes.action: to charge road duty to eu migrant workers cars who are living and using there cars in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is my belief that all eu workers cars should pay road duty, there must be over a million migrant workers in the uk that have brung there cars over to the uk, they are adding wear and tare to the roads and congesting the roads and are not paying for the use of the road.
